column4: hey i need some help... i just reinstalled my ubuntu 9.04 and my mouse is not working... what should i do?
help plz.. my mouse is not working after a reinstall
neither notebook one or usb are working
hm... ill update system to see if it solves my problem... :(
Good first start.  What make model on the laptop and the mouse?
well my laptop is a sony vaio fw139e.. i dunno if theres an specific model for the touchpad mouse :P
Let me do a bit of digging.  It does help to google around for "fw139e" and "Ubuntu"
its not that eazy to google around without using the mouse :P
True, but it CAN be done :)
but its not a problem related to the mouse model... it just worked fine before i reinstall
Outside of the install.  Unless there was something you did custom after the install?
well ill just wait for the update to finish... 250mb of packages must do something about it :P
Let me know how it goes.  I am still digging.
No luck finding anything yet on the mouse...
